Accessibility / Spacing / Font Size 2em WCAG 1.4.4

The Font Size 200% bookmarklet adds a toggle button to scale page content to 200% text size, testing for WCAG 1.4.4 Reflow requirements. Click "Enable 200% Text Zoom" to apply scaling - content should remain readable without horizontal scrolling in a 320px wide container. Click "Disable" to restore normal view.

WCAG SC 1.4.4: Resize text
